newsitem.title: USA: UNR to sell assets of home products unit.
newsitem.headline: UNR to sell assets of home products unit.

text.p: UNR Industries Inc said Tuesday it agreed to sell assets of its home products division to Franke Inc for $21.4 million cash.
The transaction is expected to close in September or October.
UNR said the sale is part of a restructuring program announced on January 26.
"We hope to announce the sale of our Real Time Solutions Inc subsidiary before year end," said the company's president, Thomas Gildenhaus.
